nodes.text: Legacy Era Campaign Guide is a hardcover supplement to the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game, written by Rodney Thompson, Sterling Hershey, and Gary Astleford.
"Every generation has its own challenges to face, its own battles to win."

More than a century has passed since the Emperor's death at the Battle of Endor. The tyrannical Sith once again rule the galaxy, and the Empire has been reborn. The heroes of old are gone, but their descendants represent the starlight in the darkness. In the Legacy era, your heroes become the galaxy's last hope, challenging the Empire, battling the Sith, and upholding the legacies of their ancestors.
THE LECACY ERA CAMPAIGN GUIDE PRESENTS A VARIETY OF OPTIONS FOR BOTH PLAYERS AND GAMEMASTERS, INCLUDING:
*New talents, feats, prestige classes, equipment, and other options for heroes.
*Information for running campaigns set in the Legacy Era.
*Characters, starships, and technology from the Legacy comics series.
